hey, I'm sam!

I've done a lot of things, but I still have no idea what I'm doing. I think I'm technically a marketer, but I also had an affair with entrepreneurship. I think by now I've had like 15 quarter life crises. I'm starting to wonder if they're really crises or just part of life.
